outcome_details: The accused, Mark Andre Davis, was found not guilty on both charges of sexual assault and sexual interference as the court could not establish his guilt beyond a reasonable doubt.
decision_factors: Reasonable doubt on the accused's evidence
Credibility and reliability concerns regarding complainant's testimony
summary: Mark Andre Davis was acquitted of charges of sexual assault and sexual interference against a 13-year-old complainant. The court found reasonable doubt in the testimony and evidence presented, failing to establish Mr. Davis' guilt beyond a reasonable doubt.
